Title: 2025-01 Dynamic Cumulative Update for Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems (KB5049981)
Description: ComponentUpdate: A security issue has been identified in a Microsoft software product that could affect your system. You can help protect your system by installing this update from Microsoft. For a complete listing of the issues that are included in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article. After you install this update, you may have to restart your system.
UninstallNotes: This software update can be removed by selecting View installed updates in the Programs and Features Control Panel.
